AFTER:  Custom parameters filtered out, TTM loads successfully, SSL training
        proceeds normally

This fix allows the hybrid SSL pipeline to run successfully, enabling
Stage 2 quality-aware SSL training to proceed.

Related Issues:
===============
- output_type is a custom parameter for our adapter, not part of TTM API
- This is a "leaky abstraction" - implementation details leaked to external lib
- Similar issues may occur with other custom parameters in the future

Future Prevention:
==================
Consider explicitly listing all TTM-accepted parameters and filtering
everything else, rather than blacklisting specific parameters.
